ComicInfo.Summary: 1. Maarooouufffaaollooooo 2. Sangrella 3. The Adventures of Fat Freddy's Cat 4. Dyke Pirates Rescue Their Captain from the Diabolic Doctors of Dover 5. Crazed Junkies Fight Killer Robots to the Death 13. Backcover Comix
